api_list.api_description: Query interface for searching arXiv articles.

optional_parameters.name: search_query
optional_parameters.description: Search terms used for the query.

optional_parameters.name: id_list
optional_parameters.description: List of arXiv article IDs for the query.

optional_parameters.name: starttime
optional_parameters.description: Limit events on or after the specified start time.

optional_parameters.name: minmagnitude
optional_parameters.description: Limit to events with a magnitude larger than the specified minimum.

query: Can you find recent articles on my latest research interest from arXiv? Also, provide earthquake data for events that occurred this year with a magnitude greater than 5.0.
